description: red face, black hair combed downward; black teeth; black cord at back; has red cloth storage bag
text: A <I>sho_jo_<I> is a fantastic elf-like creature who has a great fondness for wine. The reddish color of the mask, in fact, suggests a face flushed with alcohol. In the play "Sho_jo_," the cheerful sprite rewards a generous wine seller by magically ensuring that the merchant's jug remains eternally full. This play, usually the last part of a larger program, bids the audience good luck and a fond farewell.
title: Shōjō
